alert.note: Alert for Davidson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 06 at 3:58PM CDT until July 06 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Davidson County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 430 PM CDT. * At 358 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Oak Hill, or near Nashville, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Oak Hill, Antioch and Berry Hill. This includes the following highways... Interstate 65 between mile markers 75 and 79. Interstate 24 between mile markers 52 and 63. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
